overview: BOUT 1: Remember that movie with Jean Claude Van Damme doing splits on the hills above Hong Kong? In warm-up exercises Paul Perris does a similar stretch. Johnny wrestles in a thong and blue boots, Paul in yellow trunks and black boots. BOUT 2: In this bout you'll really see the pro experience Jason Xtreme has had, and he is a nasty one as young, wet behind the ears rookie, 18 yo Jimmy Dean, finds out in his first pro matchup. BOUT 3: Troy Lucas was a champion wrestler. When we suggested that he try his hand at pro, he said, "sure, piece of cake!" However, what he didn't realize was that we were putting him up against a nasty pro grappler, Justin Xtreme. BOUT 4: Beau Hopkins appears in a yellow thong and blue boots. Paul Perris looks sexy as all hell in his brief purple bikini and blue boots. Both grapplers are certainly among the most handsome of the Canadians. BOUT 5: Jimmy appears in sensual ass clinging, green trunks. Competitive bodybuilder, Ed Harte appears in white trunks.
title: Canadian Musclehunk Wrestling 3
